channel.title: Golang on xiwang
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on xiwang

item.title: [Go]Deferred函数案例
item.description: package main func main() { println(DeferFunc1(1)) println(DeferFunc2(1)) println(DeferFunc3(1)) } func DeferFunc1(i int) (t int) { t = i defer func() { t += 3 }() return t } func DeferFunc2(i int) int { t := i defer func() { t += 3 }() return t } func DeferFunc3(i int) (t int) { defer func() { t += i }() return 2 } 运行结果： 4 1 3
